org.springframework.cloud.sleuth

Interface SpanReporter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayListSpanAccumulator, NoOpSpanReporter

    public interface SpanReporter
    Contract for reporting Sleuth spans for collection. For example to Zipkin.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Marcin Grzejszczak

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void report(Span span)
      Reports a completed span out of band, usually out of process.

    • Method Detail

      • report

        void report(Span span)
        Reports a completed span out of band, usually out of process. This is typically to a trace depot (ex zipkin) or a log file.
